billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

title: Provides that 25 per centum of rental surcharges paid by tenant is allocable for real estate taxes and mortgage interest
summary: Provides that 25% of the amount of any rental surcharge paid by a tenant of a limited-profit (Mitchell-Lama) housing company project shall be deemed to have been directly imposed on the tenant by the municipality for real estate taxes and/or mortgage interest and to have been directly paid by the tenant to the municipality for such purposes.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to rental surcharges in certain cases
